I am deciding whether to push JUnit 4 or 3.8 with our group.  The last
not=
es I can find on the JUnit site bemoan the fact JUnit4 has not been
integra=
ted into any IDEs or test and build tools yet.  However that
was over a yea=
r ago.  Any update on this?  I would be particularly
interested in:

Eclips=
e
Netbeans
IntelliJ
Cruise Control
Fitnesse
JSystem
maven
cactus

Other bui=
ld/test tools for Database (oracle), JBoss, Echo2, etc.

Based on the recen=
t posts I saw with someone else concerning DBUnit,
it seems I should still =
stick with 3.8...?

Robert Kuropkat

P.S.  A short "you're screwed" or "act=
ually works but you must still
use JUnit4TestAdapter" answer is fine. Mainl=
y looking for a confidence
level here...
